content.question: A junction in a circuit consists of three wires connected together. Which of the following diagrams could indicate the directions and magnitudes of the currents in the three wires?

choices.label: The figure shows a junction of three wires: two horizontal segments and a downward vertical segment. The left horizontal segment shows 2 amps of current entering the junction.
